        public int getPixelBinningFactor()
        Returns:
        the pixel binning factor currently in effect.

      • getMaximumBinningFactor

        public int getMaximumBinningFactor()

      • getMinimumBinningFactor

        public int getMinimumBinningFactor()

      • setPixelBinningFactor

        public int setPixelBinningFactor(int factor)
        Parameters:
        factor - The following values are for the STS spectrometer:
        0 = 1024 pixels
        1 = 512 pixels
        2 = 256 pixels
        3 = 128 pixels

        In general, the "factor" setting is used as follows:
        Take the number of raw pixels and divide by 2 raised to the "factor" exponent. This gives the number of pixels that will be returned by wrapper.getSpectrum().

        Returns:
        the factor value specified by the caller if successful, or -1 if an IOException occurred
